NATIONAL INTEGRATED MATERNAL AND PERINATAL CARE GUIDELINES FOR SOUTH AFRICA 
130 
P
rophylactic dose 
• For post-partum prophylaxis, start 6-12 hours after delivery.
• Use Low molecular weight heparin, e.g.
o Enoxaparin, SC:
 Patient weighs <100 kg: 40 mg daily
 Patient weighs ≥100 kg: 60 mg daily

ymptoms and signs of deep vein throm
